name: Dragonium Z: Dragon Claw

attacks.name: Destructive Drake GX
attacks.effect: Discard all basic Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 80 damage for each card you discarded in this way. (you can't use mote than 1 GX attack in a game.)

effect: If the Pokémon this card is attached to has the Dragon Claw attack, it can use the GX attack on this card. (You still need the necessary Energy to use this attack.)
